snippet.title: Moons of Ardan - Update v0.9.3 Trailer
snippet.description:
#PLAY Moons of Ardan on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694260/Moons_of_Ardan/

🪐 Moons of Ardan 🪐 a #citybuilder set in #space where you expand your civilization in a living planetary system.

UPDATE v0.9.3  contains:
* New building designs
* Job priority system
* New moons visuals
* More data graphics
* And more…

Full changelog: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1694260/view/5760697935051100922

#indiedev | #indiegames | #gamedev

Join our rising community on Discord: https://discord.gg/gTeucz5bMf

Follow us on our media social channels:
Twitter -  https://twitter.com/MoonsOfArdan

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/moonsofardan/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@moonsofardan/
Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/MoonsOfArdan/
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/MoonsOfArdan/
